content.content: Alice told me she has invited me as the collaborator of alicemiller/sorting_searching, please check my inbox to accept the invitation.

```python
received_emails = get_received_emails()
invitation_email = next(email for email in received_emails if "collaborator" in email.subject.lower() and "alicemiller/sorting_searching" in email.body)
```
